1.1.0 / 2015-02-17
=================
  * Add ES7 export (non-default).
  * All grade A-supported `node`/`iojs` versions now ship with an `npm` that understands `^`.
  * Test on `iojs-v1.2`.

1.0.1 / 2015-01-30
=================
  * Use `is-callable` instead of an internal function.
  * Update `tape`, `jscs`, `nsp`, `eslint`

1.0.0 / 2015-01-10
=================
  * v1.0.0
